ya5.3.6:4.1: ⇒ Yo dukkhasaccaṃ parijānittha so samudayasaccaṃ pajahissatīti?
ya5.3.6:5.1: ⇐ Yo vā pana samudayasaccaṃ pajahissati so dukkhasaccaṃ parijānitthāti?
ya5.3.6:6.1: ⇒ Yo dukkhasaccaṃ na parijānittha so samudayasaccaṃ nappajahissatīti?
ya5.3.6:7.1: Ye maggaṃ paṭilabhissanti te dukkhasaccaṃ na parijānittha, no ca te samudayasaccaṃ nappajahissanti.
ya5.3.6:7.2: Aggamaggasamaṅgī ye ca puthujjanā maggaṃ na paṭilabhissanti te dukkhasaccañca na parijānittha samudayasaccañca nappajahissanti.
ya5.3.6:8.1: ⇐ Yo vā pana samudayasaccaṃ nappajahissati so dukkhasaccaṃ na parijānitthāti?
ya5.3.6:9.1: Arahā samudayasaccaṃ nappajahissati, no ca dukkhasaccaṃ na parijānittha.
ya5.3.6:9.2: Aggamaggasamaṅgī ye ca puthujjanā maggaṃ na paṭilabhissanti te samudayasaccañca nappajahissanti dukkhasaccañca na parijānittha.
